question: Which of the following rulers of Delhi sultanate appointed an Abyssinian slave, Malik Jamaluddin Yaqut, to the important office Amir-i-akhur?
explanation: Razia Sultan was the first and only female Muslim ruler of medieval India. She appointed an Abyssinian slave, Malik Jamaluddin Yaqut, to the important office Amir-i-akhur, which was the Superintendent of royal horses.
